eventDetails.description: An epic showdown of intellect and ingenuity at Bronx Taproom. Hosted by Demi De Jesus. Perfect for trivia enthusiasts and beer aficionados.
An exhilarating evening of brain-busting challenges at East Village. Hosted by Manny Zahonet. Includes exciting prizes and drink specials.
An epic Dungeons & Dragons adventure at East Village taproom. Suitable for seasoned players and newcomers.
A watch party for the reality TV show 'Survivor' at East Village. Includes lively discussions and the convivial atmosphere.
A concert showcase with hip hop artists at The Backyard, hosted by Alpha Minds Productions.
An event in East Village featuring local talent, magic shows, and DJ sets.

eventDetails.eventName: Beer & Fun by The Landlords & Friendly Neighborhood DJs
eventDetails.description: A Saturday afternoon music party at The Backyard with DJs and great vibes.
An evening with tattoo artist Jar at the East Village, featuring flash tattoos and a preview of a new collaboration brew.
A book club meeting at the Bronx taproom discussing 'Strange Weather in Tokyo' by Hiromi Kawakami.
$1 off Bad Business Honey Blonde Ale to celebrate World Bee Day.
Buy One, Get One on all beers to-go. Monday: $5 draft pours on all beers.

newBeerReleases.description: A new collaboration brew anticipated for release in line with Collab Night: Art by Jar event.

tastingNotes.notes: A golden brew infused with the rich flavors of local honey.
